items.name: Duck Liver Parfait
items.description: Served with toasted brioche and onion jam
suggested_questions: Is the brioche prepared separately from other gluten items?
Does the onion jam contain sulphites?

items.name: Tempura Mixed Veggies
suggested_questions: Is the fryer shared with fish or shellfish?
Can I skip the dip or get allergen-free sauce?

items.name: Smoked Salmon Blinis
items.description: With crème fraîche and caviar on buckwheat blinis
suggested_questions: Are the blinis made with lupin flour?
Does the dill sauce contain mustard or sulphites?

items.name: Mediterranean Mezze
items.description: Hummus, tapenade, falafel with sesame crackers
suggested_questions: Is lupin flour used in the falafel mix?
Are there celery seeds or nut traces in any component?

items.name: Katsu Curry
items.description: Breaded pork cutlet with curry sauce
suggested_questions: Is the curry sauce prepared with mustard or dairy?
Can you confirm it's not fried in shared oil with shellfish?

items.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
items.description: Filled with rice, nuts, and goat cheese
suggested_questions: Can I get it without nuts and cheese?
Is the stock nut and celery-free?

items.name: Shellfish Paella
items.description: Traditional rice dish with prawns, mussels, squid
suggested_questions: Are shellfish and fish cooked together or separately?
Can you confirm no wheat or sulphites in the stock?

items.name: Thai Green Curry with Tofu
items.description: Coconut curry with vegetables and protein alternatives
suggested_questions: Is the curry paste made with peanuts or fish sauce?
Does the tofu contain lupin protein?

items.name: Moroccan Lamb Tagine
items.description: Slow-cooked lamb with preserved lemons and olives
suggested_questions: Are there almonds or other nuts in the spice blend?
Do the preserved lemons contain celery or mustard seeds?

items.name: Hazelnut Chocolate Torte
items.description: Flourless cake with hazelnuts and cream
suggested_questions: Is lupin flour used in the cake base?
Does the chocolate contain sesame oil?

items.name: Orange Polenta Cake
items.description: With almond flour and citrus glaze
suggested_questions: Can I skip the glaze and confirm nut cross-contact?
Are there sulphites in the preserved orange?

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Traditional Italian dessert with mascarpone and coffee
suggested_questions: Does the mascarpone contain soy lecithin?
Is wine with sulphites used in preparation?

items.name: Bloody Mary
suggested_questions: Is there mustard, sulphites, or fish sauce in the mix?
Can I get it without celery and worcestershire?

items.name: Protein Green Smoothie
items.description: Spinach, banana, almond milk, whey protein
suggested_questions: Can I swap almond milk and whey protein for alternatives?
Is there soy lecithin or lupin protein in any ingredients?

items.name: Artisanal Coffee Blend
items.description: House special with flavored syrups and cream
